entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the Weasleys who died for Harry.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are mentioned as a family that Harry cannot bear to join.

entities.name: harry

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape's last thoughts are mentioned as being in a crystal flask.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and someone Harry yearns to see.

relationships.description: Harry cannot bear to join the Weasleys.
If Harry had given himself up, Fred might never have died.
Lupin is mentioned as someone who has died.
Tonks is mentioned as someone who has died.
Snape's last thoughts are in a crystal flask that Harry clutches.
